## Install

```
$ npm install --save tildify
```


## Usage

```js
<<<<<<< HEAD
const tildify = require('tildify');
=======
var tildify = require('tildify');
>>>>>>> 60c0efd51e9c4271a396c74cb37c9681801184ab

//=> '~/dev'
```
